Package com.microblink.view.viewfinder

Class ViewfinderShapeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.microblink.view.viewfinder.ViewfinderShapeView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback
    public class ViewfinderShapeView
extends android.view.View
    View that draws border of the chosen shape, fills shape with chosen color and fills available space outside shape borders with chosen color. Shape will be drawn inside view's available space and it will take maximal amount of space, depending on the concrete shape. This view is useful for showing viewfinders in camera overlay.

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ViewfinderShapeView.ShapeType
      Supported shape types.
